data.title: Newsweek Magazine recognizes Grupo Bimbo as one of "The most trustworthy companies in the world"
data.meta_description: Newsweek magazine's November print edition highlights companies that generate more confidence among investors, consumers, and collaborators worldwide.
data.text:
Grupo Bimbo, the leading global bakery, appears in the first edition of the "World's Most Trustworthy Companies" ranking, conducted by the U.S. magazine Newsweek and the market research provider Statista.

The world's largest bakery stands out for being positioned in the list as the second Mexican company in the food and beverage sector, ranked 16th in its category worldwide. It is also one of the 20 Mexican companies recognized by this publication..

The methodology for choosing "The World's Most Trustworthy Companies" is based on an extensive survey with more than 70,000 participants and 269,000 evaluations. This resulted in a list of the 1,000 most trusted companies in 21 countries and 23 industries.

In the listing, Grupo Bimbo participates with companies from various industries, such as Samsung, LG, Garmin, BCA, Hamilton Beach Brands, Vizio, Howdens, L'ore√°l, Transalta, Naturgy, Ottogi, Nagatanien, Tesco, Kroger and more.

These evaluations reflect the trust that companies generate among investors, consumers, and employees. Among other features, the ranking analyzes the fair treatment of customers and employees and the company's leadership in its industry.
